snippet: Brad Maiorino, formerly head of information security at General Motors, will join Target to bolster its efforts to stop security threats like the hacker intrusion last year that compromised data on millions of its customers.
abstract: Target, on eve of annual shareholders' meeting, names seasoned security expert Brad Maiorino as its new chief information security officer; retailer is seeking to bolster its data defenses and calm investor chagrin after extensive hacking it experienced in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Brad Maiorino, formerly head of information security at General Motors, will join Target to bolster its efforts to stop security threats like the hacker intrusion last year that compromised data on millions of its customers.

headline.main: Target Hires an Outsider as Its Data Watchdog
headline.print_headline: Target Hires a New Data Watchdog
